title: "Unspecified Error, Please check Logs" Problem when trying to install
body: I have tried changing my DNS settings and uninstalling and reinstalling but that doesn't work. I have restarted my router multiple times and to no avail has this worked. I've tried clicking repair but i still get "Unspecified Error, Please check Logs".  I have no Idea what any of the logs mean but there they are.

replies.body: Unfortunately, the logs won't do much for me.  A better indicator of this issue would be at the % during the patcher you're getting an error.  Let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MQ9AVg2c,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-17T23:05:28.805+0000)
>
> Unfortunately, the logs won't do much for me.  A better indicator of this issue would be at the % during the patcher you're getting an error.  Let me know!

It stopped at 83%

At this point in the process, the patcher is trying to download updates from our patching servers.  It looks like something is cutting off your connection and resulting in that error.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Thank you for the help I have gotten the game to install!
I got this problem today as well.  My league was working just fine last night though, so it's a little odd.  It's stuck at 33% and after maybe a minute or so, I get the error.

At this point, your patcher is transitioning from scanning your game files to connecting with the patching server.  Getting an error here suggests something that's blocking your connection from reaching the patching server, so I suggest going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  I hope that helps!
